analysis.summary: This repository is a focused todo application built with Next.js, React, and Tailwind CSS, leveraging Redux Toolkit for state management and localStorage for client-side persistence. It features a streamlined UI suitable for rapid interview-driven iteration, with a clear but minimal routing structure and a core feature set centered on task management.

directions.title: Clarify Onboarding Experience
directions.reason: Users may struggle initially without clear guidance or orientation, especially given minimal routing and setup steps.
directions.interviewFocus: Explore users' first impressions and what information or cues would help them start using the app confidently.

directions.title: Optimize Task Completion Flow
directions.reason: The core user activity—managing todo items—should be as efficient and frictionless as possible to support frequent use.
directions.interviewFocus: Identify points where users hesitate, perform extra actions, or feel slowed down when adding, editing, or completing tasks.

directions.title: Enhance Feedback and Confirmation
directions.reason: Users need clear, immediate feedback on their actions to build trust that changes are saved and reflected accurately.
directions.interviewFocus: Ask which interactions feel uncertain or ambiguous and what types of feedback would increase confidence in the app's responsiveness.

directions.title: Refine Todo Domain Workflow
directions.reason: The todo domain has specific task sequences that could be tightened to reduce cognitive load and improve flow.
directions.interviewFocus: Investigate how users approach managing their todo lists and where they encounter missing steps or awkward transitions.
